hirondelle.starfield

Class Main

  • Object
    • hirondelle.starfield.Main

  • public final class Main
extends Object
    Launch point for the tool. This class is uses the command line only, with no graphical interface.

    Example command line (for clarity, each part is placed on a separate line here): 

    ...starfield\classes>java 
-cp . 
-Xmx512m
hirondelle.starfield.Main 
0.993 
5.0 
C:\astro-cat\yale-bright-star-cat 
YALE_BRIGHT_STAR_CATALOG
C:\temp\test.png
STEREOSCOPIC
800
1
0
90
0

    The 11 arguments passed to the Main class itself are passed in order to the InputParameters class. If no problem is found with the input, then Starfield is used to accomplish the desired task.

    You can edit this class directly to suit your own needs.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(String... aArgs)
        Run this application from the command line. Calls Starfield.calculate() with given arguments passed on the command line. See the class comment for an example, and an explanation of the required arguments.
